channel.title: HELP PLAYING ON A SERVER, (note, if u have a server, tell me the port, ping, ip)
channel.description:
I do not know how to get onto another players server, i dont know whos server and i dont know how to even sign on.
SOMEBODY, PLEASE TELL ME THEIR SERVER IP, AND PORT. I NEED TO GET INTO ANOTHER PERSONS SERVER, IT IS BORING PLAYING ALONE.
SOMEONE PLEASE GIVE ME INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO GET ON, AND A SERVER NAME AND STUFF.

item.title: HELP PLAYING ON A SERVER, (note, if u have a server, tell me the port, ping, ip)
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Server IP: 1337scape.no-ip.org
Server Port: 43594
Ping: 0-150 (no lag man)

Read full topic
